          <title>
            <string language="en">History of science: famous names</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte der Wissenschaft: berühmte Namen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire de la science : noms célèbres</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">Multiple choice quiz about famous scientists and their discoveries.</string>

          </description>
